extracted_text: Minimum lot sizes in each area of the Butner Gateway are established by the concept plan. Where a residential area abuts a platted or developed single-family residential subdivision, the minimum lot size shall not be less than one-half of the minimum lot size of the adjoining district. However, no residential lot shall be less than 6,000 square feet in gross area.
llm_output.rationale: This section specifies the minimum lot size requirements for the Butner Gateway districts, which includes the Central Avenue Mixed-Use (CX) district. It states that minimum lot sizes are established by the concept plan, with a minimum of 6,000 square feet for residential lots.
